description.value:
A Single Meal of Vermin Meat, Hydro-Fungus, Silt Ale, Corpse Starch, Etc. Filling, but unpleasent.

Requirements

Cost of service may vary with location and the honesty/charitability of those that offer it.

Effect: Plentiful

Notes: 1 T
